description: Rundll32 can be use by Cobalt Strike with StartW function to load DLLs from the command line. Author: Wojciech Lesicki. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: CobaltStrike Load by Rundll32
query: (process.command_line:*rundll32.exe* AND process.command_line:*.dll* AND process.command_line:(*\ StartW OR *,StartW))
